Name: Animated Object (Small)
Senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6
Traits: Animated. If the object lacks legs or other appendages it can use for locomotion, it instead has a flying speed of 30 feet and can hover. If the object is securely attached to a surface or larger object, such as a chain bolted to a wall, its speed is 0.When the animated object drops to 0 hit points, it reverts to its original object form, and any remaining damage carries over to its original object form.The DM might rule that a specific objects slam attack inflicts slashing or piercing damage based on its form.
Actions: Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
